attributes.action: Advise OFCOM to force BT to scrap its £125 installation fee for reconnecting a phone line to the network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BT are holding customers to ransom by forcing them to pay a £125 fee to connect their phone line to the network if that line has not been used with BT in the last 3 months. This charge is imposed on all users regardless of whether a line already exists or not and is hitting hundreds of thousands of new homeowners and those renting flats every year.
